metadata.title: CVE-2016-6172 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: PowerDNS (aka pdns) Authoritative Server before 4.0.1 allows remote primaryDNS servers to cause a denial of service (memory exhaustion and secondaryDNS server crash) via a large (1) AXFR or (2) IXFR response.

criterions.comment: pdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
